title: Area, Volume with exp. and quad. functions part - a

content.description: Let R and S in the figure above be defined as follows: R is the region in the first and second quadrants bounded by the graphs of y = 3 - x2 and y = 2x. S is the shaded region in the first quadrant bounded by the two graphs, the x-axis, and the y-axis.
content.question: Find the area of S.

topic.text: 8.6: Finding the Area Between Curves That Intersect at More Than Two Points

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Identify mathematical information from graphical, numerical, analytical, and/or verbal representations.
